testsuite.name: com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.TcpServerTest

testcase.name: start should handle IoException during startup and stop()
stop should stop ConnectionAcceptor, ClientManager, close ServerSocket and set isRunning to false()
stopInternal should handle IOException when closing ServerSocket()
start should handle Exception during startup and stop()
start should create ServerSocket, ClientManager, and ConnectionAcceptor and start them()
